
#proteger script telegram

### RENAME TO .htaccess AND PUT together with the php and json files ###

# Block access to config.json from outside
<Files "config.json">
	require all denied
	require host localhost
	require ip 127.0.0.1
</Files>

# Protect the htaccess file
<Files .htaccess>
	Order Allow,Deny
	Deny from all
</Files>

# Disable directory browsing
Options All -Indexes

# Lines generated by 000webhost:
php_value display_errors 1
